title: Himi 27
lyrics:
7’s
1.
‘A e kau angahala
‘Oku loto mamahi,
Mou fie fakaongo
Ki he ui ‘a Sīsū.
2.
‘A e kakai, ‘alu hē
Mei he hala lelei
Mou fakato’oto’o
Pea mou tafoki mai.
3.
He ko e ngaahi lelei
‘Oku mou masiva ai,
Ko e fiemālie
Ki homou laumālie.
4.
Mou fai talangofua
Ki he ui ‘a Sīsū,
Ha’u ki homou ‘Otua
Ko homou unga’anga.
5.
‘Eiki Sīsū ‘oku mau
Hanga kiate koe,
‘O fai talangofua
Ki ho’o ui lelei. *
